string.name: do_login
string.u: Already have an account? Sign in

string.name: go_back_for_changes
string.u: Let me go back and correct something.

resources.string: Password cannot be empty and should be longer than %1$d chars
When people you invite join,\neveryone earns money.
Friends refer friends. Everyone earns money.\nLet\'s share the wealth all over the world.
I will send a link to your email address bellow.
Be sure to check spam or junkmail.
Please enter a valid promotional code
Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter a valid email address or phone number
Either email address or phone number required
Plese enter a valid postal code/zip
Your password and confirmation password do not match
Your password must be at least 8 chars length and contain uppercase and lowercase letters, digits, and special chars. Only 2 consecutive chars allowed.
You must provide a value for this field
The email address is already used.
The phone number is already used.
Both the email and phone number are already used.
This feature is not available because your device has no camera
This feature is not available because you have no camera application installed
You cannot take a picture without permissions for camera
You have no messages for now
Amount must be a positive value
Incorrect format of the numeric value
Like an elephant, we never forget. Effort is Shakti. Always remember and reward honest human effort. Tell us who referred you.
I don\'t remember who referred me
You\'ve successfuly registered your referral.\nWith your good deed, your friend is little closer to unlocking their Bonus Bounty.

string.name: refconfirm_story2
string.b: Finish your Shakti ID now to claim\nyour Bonus Bounty.

resources.string: Cool, take me to my wallet!
Special limited offer for early adopters!
Create your Shakti ID! Show Proof-of-Effort (POE), and receive an impressive bounty, valued at %1$,.2f USD!
You can only receive genesis bounty only one time. Good try \u2014 let\'s not be greedy.\nBy the way did you share your blessings with your loved ones?

You\'re almost there!

However, we need to make sure that there is no error and you provided us with a correct email address. Open the confirmation email sent to your address and click on the confirmation link.

After your email is confirmed you may return and sign in using the email and the password you just provided us with.

Complete your Shakti ID now to become a part of the Shakti world!
Got it! Take me to sign in.
For a one time payment of
Please enter a valid card data
The payment was cancelled or failed
You now have a Shakti Wallet and are part of the grassroots movement for smarter money.\n\nPlease help us spread the word by letting your networks know about the Shakti Coin movement.
Get more from your Shakti amount by earning an ongoing referral income. Become a Basic Miner by signing up for a M101 License!
Become a one-world business leader with one currency - and take your money further. Learn how.
All wallets are locked by default. It is up to the wallet holder to successfully unlock their wallets by undergoing KYC, AML & CTF compliance screening.

As a Business Leader, you\'re eligible for SXE Vault!

If you have a business or are planning to start one within the next 6 months, sign up for an SXE Vault, and move money with the least friction.

Receive the Bonus Bounty cash reward!

Get from $25,000 to $125,000 USD (SXE 5,000 to SXE 25,000) — only for early adopters!

Sign up now to receive limited-time offer Bonus Bounty SXE Coins.

This offer will be terminated without notice, so, SIGN UP NOW!

Earn an additional income with Shakti

A Miner License gives you access to our mining setups.

You can start mining SXE Coins that will be added to your wallet.

Don\'t know anything about mining? Don\'t worry, we\'re here to make it easy! Our support center experts will guide you at every step of your journey.

Get an extra SXE 10,000 ($50,000 USD) by upgrading today!

The Shakti system makes it much easier to be in charge of your financial future based on your own efforts.

How fast you unlock your bonus bounty depends entirely upon you. Tell us how many friends you are prepared to refer a day, and we will forecast how fast you can unlock your bonus bounty! We will also track your progress as you refer family and friends.

You can also become a Shakti evangelist by building the Shakti world through social media.

Tell your friends that when they sign up, they need to identify you by your email and mobile number so that you too can earn that referral. This will help you unlock your bonus bounty quickly.
Login attempt failed. Please ensure you enter correct username and password.
QR code seems does not contain referral information.
The permissions required for QR scaner were not granted.
Please select a country of residence
All fields cannot be empty. At least one field must have a value.
No Internet connection. Normal operation is not possible.
A state/province is required for the country
There are no any state or province list for the selected country
Your new Bonus Bounty balance is:
View terms associated with wallet usage.
Refer to the terms for more detailed conditions associated with claiming your bounty. You must sign up for a wallet first and ensure you have completed KYC to be eligible.
Your next of kin, just in case
Phone, email address, wallet ID, or bizVault
I consent to receiving alerts from the Shakti Network
Validate your KYC by providing 2 documents with your name and address dated within 6-months.
Submit a utility bill with your name and address.
Submit a property or finance related document with your name and address.
Submit a school or Gov or other body, that has issued an ID with your name and address.
I authorize Shakti network to enhance my Wallet security by accessing device <u>UDIDs</u>
I consent to receiving alerts from the Shakti Network
You can upload JPEG, PNG, TIFF, GIF and PDF files from photographed or scanned bills.
Your document must match your name & address.
Pay a small Fee to Validate

Any Finance Statement:
Bank
Credit Card
Post Office Saving
Mutual Funds
Other Investment
File is ready to be sent

The KYC Validation can take weeks to be processed.\n\nPay small fee to fast-track your KYC verification. By opting to pay for the processing fee, you agree to pay a non-refundable cost for expediting your KYC verification. This is a cost-recovered service paid to a third-party to expedite, verify, and confirm your ID.
Note that your wallet is inactive until we complete the KYC, AML and regulatory compliance. Please continue to monitor your progress and update your required documents as necessary.

We\'re working around the clock to ensure that your wallet is activated as soon as possible.\n\n In the meantime, keep referring friends to join Shakti to unlock your Bonus Bounty quickly. Remember, your bonus is yours to keep!
Congratulations! Your account has been verified. You\'ve passed all the compliance validations and you\'re on your way to a great start!\n\n Your wallet is now active and ready to be used.

The information you\'ve provided didn\'t match the government issued ID of your country of residence.\n\n Please review the information provided and apply again. Make sure that all fields are complete and your proof of address is valid and readable. Remember your bounty is still yours to keep and you can continue to work on unlocking it.
Skip KYC verification with a Miner License!
You can choose to buy a Mining License and skip the Regular or Fast-Track KYC Verification Process.

string.name: kyc_rejected_review
string.u: Review my information and re-send for verification.

resources.string: Your wallet is inactive until the Shakti Network completes the KYC, AML, and regulatory compliance. Be assured that once you register and claim your bounty, it is yours to keep as long as you comply with your bounty conditions. Shakti will work around the clock to make sure your wallet is activated.
Would you like to unlock it?
1. Your Bonus Bounty will be automatically unlocked after 7 years of using your wallet at least once a month.
2. You can speed up this process by referring friends and family to join the Shakti World.
3. Mix it up: Use your wallet at least once a month and make your friends early adopters at the same time. In no time, you will be able to unlock your bounty.
How fast can you unlock your Bounty?
I will refer %1$d people per day, based on my effort I will unlock my bonus bounty within %2$d days.
We will track your effort to unlock your bounty and continue to forecast your efforts. Remember it is your effort that counts.
Refer friends by entering their info, or by inviting contacts from your social media accounts.

How to earn your
Bonus Bounty Reward!

Use the wallet once a month for 7 years (84 months).

Following 84 months of use, your Bonus Bounty will be unlocked on your next birthday as our gift to you.

To get it faster, refer friends.
Each friend you refer reduces the waiting time by one month.

If you package type to reduce your waiting time strictly through referrals, your Bonus Bounty will be unlocked on your next birthday.
Fill in the referral info below
Tap the progress buttons to see the social specific leads.

A licensed miner earns income by mining Shakti coins. We will provide you with a mining software application to access the SXE Network to start mining.

Sign up now to maximize your success in the new digital currency world. There are limited Power Mining slots, and they will go fast!

Get an extra SXE 10,000 by upgrading now!

M101 License Features:

  •  Mine Shakti Coins from anywhere.
  •  No business registration is required.

string.name: miner_intro_cancel
string.u: No, I don’t want to earn a mining income

resources.string: The M101 license allows you to mine SXE coins. You must provide the hardware and connectivity necessary to mine coins. Refer to the Terms and Conditions of the Shakti Network and the Bonus Bounty Offer before you sign up.

Your Bonus Bounty varies depending on the type of business you own or are planning to start in the near future. Your bonus capital could range from $5,000 to $125,000 USD in equivalent SXE for early adopters.
You now have a M101 Basic Miner amount.
Congratulations! You chose to become a Shakti Miner. You\'re on your way to financial success.
Want to be a Power Miner and Transform the World?
Get an additional bonus bounty and start developing your exclusive territory.
You must submit a business registration and activate your SXE Wallet to become a Power Miner.
You are eligible to Sign Up for SXE Vault.

If you have a business or you are planning to start a business within the next 6-months, you can sign up for SXE Vault.\n\n Shakti Coin helps you become a one-world business leader and make important changes. So, enjoy new financial freedom for you and your loved ones.

string.name: vault_adv_cancel
string.u: No, I don\’t want a vault for my business

resources.string: The Bonus Bounty is granted to you as an introductory offer on a first come, first serve basis. This is intended for early adopters who direct their efforts to refer other early adopters. The Shakti Foundation may end this promotional offer without any notice.
If you wish to be updated with current transactional tax related risks, please check this box for additional information.
What would you like to say?
Keep your password safe & and secret.
Secure lock screen has not set up. Please set a lock screen method in the device Settings.
Choose the payment type that fits best for you.
Finish the payment to complete registration
Unexpected error happen during the transfer or insufficient funds
You have successfully registered. A ShaktiID has been created with a link to your email and your mobile number.
Which School do you want to Onboard?
You are about to create a new wallet. Please enter a password and keep it in secret. You will need it to access your wallet.
The main passphrase and confirmation passphrase are not equal
You must confirm both email address and mobile phone number before proceed. Please click the link in the message you should find in your mailbox and enter verification code from the SMS.
Please enter a verification code from the SMS
The account is created and you can log in now
Uh-oh, invalid email. Please enter your email in format yourname@domain.com
We just sent a link to your email address.\nClick the link to confirm your email.

string.name: reg__email_letme_go_back
string.u: Let me go back and correct something

resources.string: This email is in use already, please try another.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Something went wrong. Please try after some time.
Sorry! You may be using a temporary email. SHAKTI does not support disposable email. Or you may be using email from a blacklisted domain. Use different email.
Sorry! Too many attempts. You are blocked for 60 minutes.
%1$s is a registered user. Proceed to log in!
Email confirmed. Enter your mobile number to continue.
We will send you an SMS with a verification code.
The value must be a valid phone number
Please recheck your mobile and country code
Sorry! Disposable mobile is not allowed. Proceed with a real mobile number.
Sorry! Too many attempts. You are blocked for 60 minutes.
Sorry! Verification code is invalid. Please provide the correct OTP.
Sorry! Verification code is expired. Click the below link to re-send the OTP.
A ShaktiID has been created with a link to your email and your mobile number
Something went wrong. Please start again.
Select one method to unlock your bounty
You will earn USD 25.00 (five SXE coins) towards your birthday for each person you refer to, and it will be unlocked just-in-time for your birthday celebration.
Refer 84 participants to unlock your bounty and ensure at least five participants are from the merchant community.
Just use the wallet once a month to unlock your bounty.
Your quantum genesis bonus bounty is released on your birthday only, whether it is a partial or full payout when one of the above conditions are met.
An invitation link has copied to the clipboard. Please use it to refer Shakti to your friends or family via selected media.
